DOC.brief_summary: A six week , fix dose , double-blind , double-dummy , placebo , active control , multicentre trial evaluate safety efficacy CP-316,311 outpatient major depressive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Multicentre Trial Evaluate Safety Efficacy CP-316,311 Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This study terminate March 17th , 2006 . The result primary analysis interim show CP-316,311 group significantly different placebo primary endpoint therefore data monitor committee recommend termination trial . The decision terminate trial base safety concern .
DOC.criteria: Outpatients DSMIV major depressive disorder Women child bear potential
